prod_short_desc: Grow and trade your crops at the Melon Farm!
prod_long_desc:
Harvest your crops and make a Carrot on a Stick to guide the saddled pig to the Melon Farm, trade your melon slice with the villager and activate the exploding Creeper™ function. Enjoy hands-on Minecraft™ adventures with this LEGO® Minecraft set—designed for fans of the highly successful sandbox video game. Combine this set with other LEGO Minecraft models to create your own unique LEGO Minecraft universe. Also includes a Steve LEGO Minecraft minifigure.
Includes 2 LEGO® Minecraft™ minifigures: Steve and a villager, plus pig and Creeper™ figures.
Features a buildable Minecraft™ melon farm setting with decorative melon banner, crops and exploding Creeper™ function.
Pull the carrot from the ground and make a Carrot on a Stick to guide the saddled pig.
Activate the exploding Creeper™ function.
Accessory elements include a chest, 2 carrots, 2 melons, 2 potatoes and a melon slice.
Set your imagination free—rebuild the set for more LEGO® Minecraft™ creations!
This building toy includes over 65 pieces and is suitable for ages 6-14.
Measures over 2” high, 3” wide and 3” long.
